title: Axial heteroatom (P, S and Cl)-decorated Fe single-atom catalyst for the oxygen reduction reaction: a DFT study
content:
RSC Adv., 2024, 14,16379-16388
DOI: 10.1039/D4RA01754D, Paper
Open Access
  This article is licensed under a Creative Commons Attribution 3.0 Unported Licence.
Qian Xue, Xuede Qi, Kun Li, Yi Zeng, Feng Xu, Kai Zhang, Xueqiang Qi, Li Li, Andreu Cabot
Overpotential and ΔG(*OH) have a volcanic relationship, the catalytic process is hindered by too strong or too weak interaction between catalyst and adsorbate. ORR is constrained in strong binding region by the reduction of *OH to H2O.
